description: Try our easy to follow Mini Lamb Roast with Fresh Mint Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast lamb,Roast,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Potato,Zucchini,High protein,Soy free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mini Lamb Roast with Fresh Mint Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 bunch mint, leaves removed, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Line a baking tray with baking paper. Place potatoes onto tray and spray with olive oil.
Using a small, sharp knife, make 5-6 incisions into each piece of lamb. Insert a slice of garlic into each incision. Spray with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Place into a shallow baking dish.
Place potatoes onto top rack of oven and lamb underneath.
Roast for 40-45 minutes until potatoes are golden and crisp and lamb will be medium-rare. Cook lamb longer if you prefer.
Transfer lamb to a chopping board and stand for 10 minutes before slicing.
Meanwhile, using a vegetable peeler, run the length of zucchini forming ribbons.
Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add zucchini ribbons and cook for 1-2 minutes or until just tender. Drain.
To make mint sauce, place chopped mint into a jug. Cover with boiling water. Add sugar and stir until dissolved. Add vinegar and season with salt and white pepper. Stir until well combined.
Serve lamb with roasted potatoes, zucchini ribbons and mint sauce.
